variants.Description in input context: This variant is a missense mutation that causes the substitution of Glutamine (Q) at position 32 with Lysine (K), and Arginine (R) at position 28.

Readout description.Result Description: The protein expression level for the variant NM_000031864.2:c.97G>A was reduced by 50% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each technical replicate was performed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA cDNA was used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed t-test was used to compare the means between the wild-type and mutant samples.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels greater than 80% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels less than 60% of wild-type.
